item.title: Career types
item.description:
Source: Daniel Vassallo on Twitter

There are two distinct types of careers:

  • One where achieving success is highly accessible and predictable (doctor, programmer, plumber, architect).
  • The other where chance plays a huge role in achieving success (musician, author, startup founder, youtuber).

If you want to pursue an unpredictable career, you canâ€™t treat it the same as a regular job. What works in the predictable world doesn’t work in a world where randomness dominates in what makes it and what doesn’t. You need to unlearn almost everything and work differently:
